course_description: This course surveys common methods used in empirical corporate finance research, with an emphasis on practical issues. This course will also expose students to many of the important topics in corporate finance, including both seminal papers and working papers on the cutting edge of the field.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: Th 10am-1pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W520
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1201, Section #: 5101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10a-1p, Instructor: G. Maturana, Status: Closed
